subject: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Attention: Beneficiary,
This is to inform you that I have paid the activation fee and
I paid for the delivery of your ATM Card because the ATM Card ($2,500,000)
has less than three days to expire and when it expires, the money will go to
Government wallet. With that I decided to help you pay the money so that,
the ATM card will not expire because I know when you will receive it
You should definitely return my money and even compensate me for
Help
you.
Now I want you to contact DHL Delivery Service with your Full Contact
information so they can deliver their ATM card to the designated office
direction without delay. As I said before, shipping costs
has
They were paid, but I did not pay their official maintenance fees since
refused.
They refused and the reason is that they don't know when you are going.
a
Contact them and the delay could increase. They told me that their
The maintenance fee is $50 per day
 and I deposited it today. Below is your
Contact
information,
Contact Person: Honorable Dr. Jerry Leo
DHL delivery service
Email: (
dhlcustomer19@outlook.com
)

subject: Re: Attention: Beneficiary,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I appreciate your help in paying the activation fee and delivery charges for my ATM card. It's good to know that you are looking out for me so that the card doesn't expire.

Could you please provide me with more details about the DHL Delivery Service? How can I contact them? Is there a specific person or department I should reach out to? Also, could you clarify what official fees they are referring to?

I want to make sure that everything is in order and that there won't be any further delays. Your assistance has been valuable, and I want to ensure that we handle this situation properly.

Thank you again for your support.

Best wishes,
Michael
